thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's Corporation Bank Posts Dec Qtr Loss

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Corporation Bank Posts Dec Qtr Loss

organizations.name: brief-india's corporation bank posts dec qtr loss

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Corporation Bank:
* DEC QUARTER NET LOSS 12.40 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 1.59 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER INTEREST EARNED 43.88 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 49.54 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS 27.84 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 9.34 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS FOR NON-PERFORMING ASSETS 24.95 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 9.92 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER GROSS NPA 15.92 PERCENT VERSUS 15.28 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER
* DEC QUARTER NET NPA 10.73 PERCENT VERSUS 10.24 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER Source text - bit.ly/2G6RV60 Further company coverage:
